title: Fireman Sam. Treasure hunt
brief_description: Four more adventures with Sam and his friends in the little Welsh village of Pontypandy. “Treasure Hunt”: Sarah and James find more than buried treasure in the village park! “Sam’s Day Off”: Sam becomes an inventor in his spare time but his pop-corn machine has a few teething problems. “Thief in Pontypandy”: things go missing all over the village. Can Sam solve the mystery? “Chemistry set”: Norman’s experiments in chemistry backfire.
